response.overview: "Ecstatic States" is an 80-minute documentary that features Ram Dass (Dr. Richard Alpert), a prominent figure in the exploration of consciousness and spirituality. Originally a psychology professor at Harvard, Ram Dass, along with Timothy Leary and Aldous Huxley, played a significant role in introducing concepts related to higher powers of the mind and ecstatic states to a generation.
response.tagline: A Unique and Stunning Revelation, for people who are interested in a Logical, Stimulating, Humorous and Personal Explanation of Higher and Expanded States of Consciousness, and what life truly has to offer
response.title: Ecstatic States with Ram Dass
